## ContextViewEvent interface

An event emitted by a `ContextView`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ContextViewEvent<T> extends ContextEvent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cachedValue](./context.contextviewevent.cachedvalue.md) | T | Optional cached value for an <code>unbind</code> event |
